description: Provides the fastest possible access to the Binance Rest API/User Data Streams and Websocket Market Streams with an emphasis on creating requests quickly and caching data when possible so requests are more responsive, This library is the best option if you want to trade Spot or Margin
releaseNotes:
Add CachableSpotRequestPartial
			Add CachableSpotRequestPartialMarket
			Add CacheClientSpot.CreateOrderLimitPartial
			Add CacheClientSpot.CreateOrderMarketPartial
			CachableSpotRequestPartial needs to be completed by adding the Price and Quantity
			CachableSpotRequestPartialMarket needs to be completed by adding the Quantity or Quote Quantity
			CachableSpotRequestPartial can be reused by calling Complete again
			CachableSpotRequestPartialMarket can be reused by calling Complete again

			Updated Examples in Documentation/README
			
			Add CachableMarginRequestPartial
			Add CachableMarginRequestPartialMarket
			Add CacheClientMargin.CreateMarginOrderLimitPartial
			Add CacheClientMargin.CreateMarginOrderMarketPartial
			CachableMarginRequestPartial needs to be completed by adding the Price and Quantity
			CachableMarginRequestPartialMarket needs to be completed by adding the Quantity or Quote Quantity
			CachableMarginRequestPartial can be reused by calling Complete again
			CachableMarginRequestPartialMarket can be reused by calling Complete again

			----------------

			Change all occurances of IEnumerable to List

			----------------

			Add Optimized version of Trade Stream that only generates the Price to create real time Last Price

			Add BinanceStreamTradePrice
			Add BinanceStreamTradePriceGenerator
			Add RealTimeLastPriceUpdates - https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/#trade-streams - Price Only

			socketClient.RealTimeLastPriceUpdates() - Subscribes to real time last price information for a symbol

			Add KlineUpdatesUtc8 - https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/#kline-candlestick-streams-with-timezone-offset

			socketClient.KlineUpdatesUtc8() - Subscribes to the candlestick update stream for the provided symbol and interval, UTC+8 timezone offset

			----------------

			Add BinanceUserAsset
			Add BinanceUserAssetGenerator
			Add GetUserAsset - https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/#user-asset-user_data

			restClient.General.GetUserAsset() - Get information for a single user asset, positive results only

			----------------

			Add Pow10 Math Helper
			Add Scale extension to decimal, example below

			StepSizeScale = new DecimalHelper(BinanceSymbol.LotSizeFilter?.StepSize.Normalize() ?? decimal.Zero).Scale;
			PriceTickScale = new DecimalHelper(BinanceSymbol.PriceFilter?.TickSize.Normalize() ?? 1).Scale;

			decimal scaled = someDecimal.Scale(StepSizeScale)
			decimal scaled = someDecimal.Scale(PriceTickScale)

			----------------

			Add DecimalHelper struct to expose the Scale field

			Add Quote Order Quantity to Spot Market Orders
			Add Quote Order Quantity to Margin Market Orders

			Add CacheClientSpot.CreateOrderMarketQuote
			Add CacheClientMargin.CreateMarginOrderMarketQuote

			Invariant Culture

			----------------

			Please use the most recent version visible on Nuget, old versions are hidden but can still be downloaded indirectly
title: BinanceAPI.NET
